txt.en: The Search for the Missing Man
An inhabitant of Dunfast has left and abandoned his home, and you cannot help but hope that he may have information for you.

You ask Gifemund about Iothete, the man who no longer lived at Dunfast. The draughty home piques your interest once again.

'Oh, Iothete? A senile old fool. He kept insisting that he was given a cursed relic, and then he left town when no one believed him.

'He holes himself up in the northern woods, now.'
'Another stranger come to lay a curse on me? Or...do you seek refuge from the cold?\n\n'Which is it? Speak up at once!'
Find Iothete, the owner of the empty home
Based on the memories of the townsfolk, Iothete likely headed north into the woods from Dunfast.\n\nYou should search for Iothete, the man with the empty home.

'That was an interesting tale! It would seem that this missing fellow might have information for you, [placeholder].\n\n'I will remain here and help these people get back on their feet. Do come back when you find that man! I must continue my search....
Cyneberg is at the refugees' hideout in the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Cyneberg.
Based on the memories of the townsfolk, the missing men likely headed north into the woods from Dunfast.\n\nYou should search for the missing man.
